```{r}
clean_names
```

```{r}
mode <- clean_names %>%

mode
```

```{r}
clean_names
```

```{r}
clean_names %>%
  filter("brand" == "Samsung") %>%
  summarise(
    mean_ratings = mean(rating),
    sd = sd(rating)
    )
 
    
    
  

  
```

```{r}
clean_names %>%
  
ggplot(aes(x = brand)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..), col = "white", bins = 25) +
  stat_function(
    
    fun = dnorm,
    arg = list(
      mean_ratings,sd
    ),
    col = "red"
  )
  
```
